pr_title: [lutron] Add support for mDNS bridge discovery

timeline.message:
[lutron] Add support for mDNS bridge discovery

* Add support for mDNS bridge discovery
* Add additional properties for all LIP bridges
* Restrict mDNS discovery to Smart Bridge Pro 2

Signed-off-by: Bob Adair <bob.github@att.net>

[lutron] Minor updates to mDNS discovery

Signed-off-by: Bob Adair <bob.github@att.net>

timeline.bodyText: There are global constants available for some properties like this (see Thing.java).
timeline.author: cweitkamp

replies.bodyText: Ok. The ones that are just properties I changed to use the global constants from Thing. The ones that are user-settable parameters I left using local definitions.
replies.author: bobadair

timeline.bodyText: I think we can reduce logging level to DEBUG here. Otherwise it may spam log files if a user is not interested in discovery or does not have the chance to solve it.
timeline.author: cweitkamp

replies.bodyText: Well, I purposely set this to INFO here so that users would be encouraged to report unknown DEVCLASS numbers. The one for Caseta is the most common, but I've had no luck in finding (or getting people to report) the numbers for less common devices.  Once users report them, I can add support for them very quickly.
replies.author: bobadair

timeline.bodyText: We plan to get rid of apache.commons dependency in OH3. Are you able to replace the usage of StringUtils in this class?
timeline.author: cweitkamp
